verbose_text: XREF_BIBR Stimulation of insulin secretion by glucose involves the uptake and metabolism of the sugar via glucose transporters (Glut2 and/or Glut1), XREF_BIBR phosphorylation by glucokinase, XREF_BIBR and enhanced mitochondrial ATP synthesis.
